movie.title: Hacker
movie.description_intro: Thirteen-year-old Benjamin discovers that his mother didn't die in an accident as he was led to believe. The trail points to high-ranking officials in the Danish Secret Service, and he is told to trust no one.
movie.description_full: Thirteen-year-old Benjamin discovers that his mother didn't die in an accident as he was led to believe. The trail points to high-ranking officials in the Danish Secret Service, and he is told to trust no one.

movies.title: The Hills Have Eyes
movies.summary: While celebrating their 30th wedding anniversary, a couple are traveling through the desert with their 3 children, son in law and their baby granddaughter. While the rest of the family agrees there are plenty of better and more appropriate things to do to celebrate an anniversary, they make do with what they have, but things take a turn after a sketchy gas station attendant informs them about a "short cut" that will take them in between a series of hills in the desert. It doesn't take too long before they realize they're not alone and the hills indeed do have eyes.

movies.title: People of the Po Valley
movies.summary: A documentary short detailing the life of Italians living on the Po River in the 1940s.
movies.description_full: A documentary short detailing the life of Italians living on the Po River in the 1940s.
movies.synopsis: A documentary short detailing the life of Italians living on the Po River in the 1940s.

movies.title: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
movies.title_english: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
movies.title_long: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood (1996)
movies.summary: "Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking your Juice in the Hood" is a parody of several U.S. films about being in the 'Hood', for instance "Boyz n the Hood", "South Central", "Menace II Society", "Higher Learning" and "Juice". We follow Ashtray as he returns to the place he grew up in and meet his father and his basket-case friends. Crazy stuff happens. For example, Ashtray is older than his father and his best friend Loc Dog's grandmother is a trigger-happy old lady who blames her eccentric-looking kid for not being tough enough.

movies.title: Overheard 2
movies.summary: A stockbroker working with a crime syndicate is hurt in a car accident while attempting to evade a surveillance operative.
movies.description_full: A stockbroker working with a crime syndicate is hurt in a car accident while attempting to evade a surveillance operative.
